Package pl.project.hotel

Class Room

java.lang.Object
pl.project.hotel.Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a hotel room that can be rented by guests. It contains information about the room number, price per day, availability, description, capacity, and reservation details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(int number, double pricePerDay, String description, int capacity, String visitorName, LocalDate dateOfCheckIn, LocalDate dateOfCheckOut)
      Constructs a Room object.
      Parameters:
      number - the room number.
      pricePerDay - the price per day.
      description - a description of the room.
      capacity - the maximum number of guests.
      visitorName - the name of the guest, or null if the room is available.
      dateOfCheckIn - the check-in date of the guest, or null if the room is available.
      dateOfCheckOut - the check-out date of the guest, or null if the room is available.

    • checkIn

      public void checkIn(String visitorName, LocalDate dateOfCheckIn, int lengthOfStay)
      Checks in a guest to the room.
      Parameters:
      visitorName - the name of the guest.
      dateOfCheckIn - the check-in date.
      lengthOfStay - the length of stay in days.

    • checkOut

      public double checkOut()
      Checks out a guest from the room and calculates the cost of the stay.
      Returns:
      the cost of the stay, based on the number of days between check-in and the current date.
